Literature.Title: Cross-Strand Interaction, Central Bending, and Sequence Pattern Act as Biomodulators of Simplified β-Hairpin Antimicrobial Amphiphiles.
Literature.Author: Shao C, Zhu Y, Jian Q, Lai Z, Tan P, Li G, Shan A
